ghost

Class GameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ghost.GameManager

  • public class GameManager
extends java.lang.Object
    GameManager is a small helper (wrapper) class that does not have its own instance method/attributes. Its whole functionality is processing key events, keycodes into understandable instruction.

    • Method Detail

      • keyPressed

        public static java.lang.String keyPressed(int keyCode)
        Parameters:
        keyCode: - int keyCode passed by the keyPressed method in App.
        Returns:
        temp_input: stands for temporary/raw input in the form of a String, "right","left","up","down".This temp_input will not be directly used by Waka.

      • debug

        public static boolean debug(int keyCode,
                            boolean debug)
        The method detects if the space bar is pressed.
        Returns:
        true: the space bar is pressed, signalling starting the debug mode. false: the space bar is not pressed.
